amendment.description: To reduce barriers to combined heat and power systems and waste heat to power systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3292 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3292 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 2953.
